table inet hostvrf-vrf0 {
	chain raw-prerouting {
		type filter hook prerouting priority raw; policy accept;
		ct zone set 257 iif "vrf0"
	}

	chain nat-postrouting {
		type nat hook postrouting priority srcnat; policy accept;
		iif "vrf0" oif != "vrf0" meta l4proto { tcp, udp } ct mark set 0x00000101 counter packets 0 bytes 0 masquerade
	}

	chain mangle-prerouting {
		type filter hook prerouting priority mangle; policy accept;
		iif != "vrf0" meta l4proto { tcp, udp } ct mark 0x00000101 counter packets 0 bytes 0 meta mark set 0x00000101
	}
}
